title: Looking at Life Sciences Investment Landscape
itunes:title: Looking at Life Sciences Investment Landscape
description:
Michelle Dipp, Co-Founder of Biospring Partners, discusses focusing investments on new ways of manufacturing from the creation of new drugs to innovations in synthetic biology and gene editing.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
